website_summaries.verdict: The TDK Sound Cube looks like nothing else, and its big sound and flexible input options make it a party machine.
pros: The TDK Sound Cube packs powerful sound into a portable, well-crafted box, decked out with tons of audio input options (including iPod and iPhone), EQ, FM radio, and the option of battery power
cons: There's no remote, iPod dock, or AM radio, and the exposed speakers make the TDK Sound Cube a poor choice for use outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Great sound! Not really a true, wireless portable
customer_reviews.text: Great as a plug-in. Good, low-end heavy sound. I like that I can play music directly off a USB drive. As a true portable, it's not great. It takes about $30 worth of D batteries, so it's really not feasible to use it in that manner. But when you get down to it, to get really good sound, you need real power and this thing has it. Considering buying 2. Not something you'd take to the beach, but great to use plugged in by the pool, in the bathroom or even as a home stereo.
customer_reviews.author: jstephens

customer_reviews.title: Loving the Cube
customer_reviews.text: TDK's Sound Cube feels very well made and sounds better than I'd imagined. The bass it pumps out is excellent given the woofer size. For the price, it's far and away the best portable speaker system I've heard. Note: portability comes at a small price. If you take this on a plane flight, you will have your luggage searched every time. As a TSA agent said, "Man, that thing looks SINISTER on the x-ray."
customer_reviews.author: bashopoem

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs a TDK Life on Record
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound, I also have TDK two speaker boombox and I like this better. The sound is amazingly clear, loud and plenty of bass. I like the form factor as well, its square, short and low center of gravity make it next to impossible to accidentally tip over on say a uneven picnic table or something like that. Minus 1 star because this like their other boombox will still draw power from the batteries when it is turned off, fresh batteries will be dead in less than a week if not removed.
customer_reviews.author: J.T.M. Point Place

customer_reviews.title: A nearly perfect mobile audio system
customer_reviews.text: The TDK Life on Record Sound Audio Cube is the ideal mobile sound system for camping trips, the beach, road trips, picnics and BBQs. It is of sturdy build and comes with connectors for all types of equipment except the iPhone 5. It features simple and effective touchscreen control and the volume levels goes to a designation of 11. I love the fact they did that! As far as the sound goes, the audio is crisp, clear and loud. So far, I have not found fault with the unit. It is truly ideal for anyone looking for this type of speaker unit. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: DJPeebs

customer_reviews.title: it's one of the smallest yet loudest and good sounding speaker with decent battery life
customer_reviews.text: It does take a lot of batteries and they get very expensive; however, it's one of the smallest yet loudest and good sounding speaker with decent battery life. We used it a few times outside for a street performance. I keep the battries in but stick a pice of paper to insulate it and draining the batteries. I do wish it had bluetooth but it is still the best inexpensive outdoor speaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: T. Take

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Sound is amazing out of this small speaker box. Bought it for outdoor movie nights and has been been great. It is way better than the new version. Although the new one has BT connectivity, this previous version is portable, meaning it takes batteries. New version has to be plugged in at all times so it is not practical if you want portability and don't mind an extra wire to hook up your devices. I think the new version doesn't have a tuner either! TDK stopped making this old version of the life on record cube so I am glad I found one here.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Castellanos

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sound!  Portability is nice!
customer_reviews.text: Base is clean and clear, especially for such a small thing, mids and highs balance well, careful with the volume knob because it may be louder than you think! Took it backpacking in the woods, batteries lasted 3 days with 1/2 - 3/4 volume for probably 4 hours a day at least! So, carry an extra set of batteries for like a week long trip, but 2-3 days is no problem on one set of batteries, we pissed off plenty of people with this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Badass speaker
customer_reviews.text: Badass sound quality for the price. Bought rechargeable batteries to make it portable and affordable (D batteries are expensive). If you like quality portable base, this is a great speaker. This thing cranks up.
customer_reviews.author: K. Pedigo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful full range sound and excellent bass
customer_reviews.text: The TDK Sound Cube packs a powerful punch. It has excellent sound quality and tremendous bass. It easily fills a large room with sound. The USB connection works great with our iPods and iPhones. It keeps them charged while allowing it to source the music. We love this unit so much we bought 2 of them. Great for parties or backyard cookouts.
customer_reviews.author: TruReview4U

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound, from a cool package
customer_reviews.text: Buying online has it's disadvantages from time to time you purchase something that looks good but does not live up to the way it looks. This looks as good in person as it does online. It's easy to use and portable, I have not tried using the battery feature yet so I'm onlu giving this 4 stars. But, if the batteries last in the device for a decent amount of time this will be the radio I take with me on travel.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Eads

customer_reviews.title: Friggin awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound cube. It pumps out some amazing sound. I've already had the police called on me two times by the neighbors. I've even hauled it around on trips and it works out great. It's ridiculously loud and clear. It can put out some great bass for such a compact thing. Probably one of my favorite purchases ever.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan McCarley

customer_reviews.title: Superb Sound; Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I always enjoy finding a good deal on a refurbished product. We needed something to play a diverse playlist in a locker room. This baby pumps out the sound. Very good bass. Versatile inputs. I'll have this out by the pool this summer. Arrived in original box and in top notch condition at about 1/3 of MSRP. Great Deal.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Booming Bass
customer_reviews.text: It's like having a mono speaker with a built in subwoofer. Very nice sound at all volume levels. When compared to the jawbone big jambox, which I also have, the TDK has a superior sound. The jawbone is no slouch either. Only minus is that it's 6 times larger than the jawbone and not rechargeable and lacks built in wireless connectivity (both deficiencies can be remedied with rechargeable D batteries and a bluetooth dongle, however).
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I like it, its big, but the sound is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Recieved this item in record time, however it was used, i purchased new. i called amazon and they said it showed that i purchased it new, they gave me a little bit of credit back for this issue, i have a month left to decide wether i want to return it for my full refund or not. its kinda big to find a new box and send it. it was scratched and had already been opened, missing items, totally the sellers fault.. beware
customer_reviews.author: Warren Keller

customer_reviews.title: The best I've heard!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome player. Sounds great with nice bass and treble response. The equalizer enables you to control your bass and treble to your liking. I liked it so much, I bought two of them!!
customer_reviews.author: RZII

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Power and Sound
customer_reviews.text: This thing really kicks it. It's amazingly loud. Really. I love it. Warning though, I tried to update the firmware and ended up crippling the device.... No worries though, TDK is sending me a new one:)
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Rich

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality and Sounding
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sounding. Much better than the Altec Lansing Boombox I orginally bought and retuned. Highly satisfied with my purchase. TDK is definitely back in the game. Highly reccomended.
customer_reviews.author: Mikestroh

customer_reviews.title: Reall Cool Unit
customer_reviews.text: I really like this TDK Cube. The sound is great and stays surprisingly crisp at higher levels. I like how TDK incorporated modern audio features in a more old school box. I definitely recommend this cube.
customer_reviews.author: Chris/Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound (much better than my BOSE), great retro look, portable, durable. I'm ordering another for a gift. What a great price. I remember when these were close to $400
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: May the Cube be With You!
customer_reviews.text: I found out about the TDK Life on Record series on the Web. Most every gadget or lifestyle site raved about the concept and the humungous boombox. But I really didn't have enough space for the boombox, so I go the Soundcube. It was definitely a smart purchase. The clarity at lower volumes is superior to my component stereo system and I really like the USB interface as opposed to just a headphone-style jack. I can hook up my portable hard drive, and play whatever I want without searching for CDs or turning on the computer. A great sonic idea!
customer_reviews.author: Adam J. Gottlieb

customer_reviews.title: Quite a mighty system!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this product. It is clearer with a crisper sound than other bigger, more costly products. I wish I had known about this product sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Baker Woman

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed and happy with the Cube. I really like the sound, and I think it's a great value -- I bought our unit for around $150. Very solid. Nice controls. I don't expect to ever use it as a "portable" with batteries, but we'll take it to events (athletic practices, parties, etc) where we have a place to plug it in.
customer_reviews.author: amazon scott

customer_reviews.title: TDK sound cube
customer_reviews.text: If you like sound with bass , this is for you! You won't have very loud sound but pretty loud. The battery life satisfied my expectations , again it depends how loud the music is playing. I would give 5 stars but tried to play some music files from thumb drive and got the notification that memory card is not supported. Didn't try another one though. Very solid unit , you won't be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: great little stereo with big sound
customer_reviews.text: stereo has 4 speakers one on each side and sounds amazing given its small foot print. Purchased the Cube for use in my pool area and it works great. ipod/iphone compatible with USB port. Very portible with sturdy leather strap on top.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L. Cline

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound & portable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our son! Great sound & compact! Works with batteries or plug in! He & his friends couldn't believe the quality of the sound of it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: SO happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This thing really put out! Deep bass, amazing highs, great FM reception, and LOUD. I do agree with other reviewers that the exposed woofer cones and tweeters could possibly be a problem in some instances, such as packing it into a car trunk with other items for a road trip getaway. Not sure how much it can withstand something knocking into the cone for example. The other aspects of its construction are very solid, and the 'touch screen' selection for functions coupled with dials is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: MikeZ

customer_reviews.title: Lacking connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Great build and finish. Sound quality is very good. My only complaint is that it doesn't work with 3rd gen iPod via UBS =/
customer_reviews.author: housermag

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I've bought in a long time...if you love music you'll love this. Period.
customer_reviews.author: Time Zone Away

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound
customer_reviews.text: Got it for $100 and it is worth! Pros Good Sound Price Cons No remote display could show the songs
customer_reviews.author: Chrisys

customer_reviews.title: Solid, great volume
customer_reviews.text: A great speaker for outdoor gatherings. Very durable, can handle lots of lugging around. The bluetooth add-on available in the newer model would've been nice but the newer model seemed less durable and more cheaply built.
customer_reviews.author: kevin south

customer_reviews.title: Awesome box!
customer_reviews.text: Just received the TDK sound cube! WOW! Nice solid construction. Very cool look to it. Feels like I just procured some alien artifact. ;) And the sound is just simply Awesome! Very pleased with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Loeffel

customer_reviews.title: awsome
customer_reviews.text: Simply awsome. Have been using this for a month and I really love it! Good sound Easy setup Good loocks Hi quality sound Suprisingly high volume
customer_reviews.author: Erikold

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT BUT
customer_reviews.text: Excellent option for small, medium areas, the mix feature works well and is an option for including instruments. Bad thing, I paid usd220 and 20 days later was usd153, I live outside the US, so returning it it's a complicated option. But still great. It would be good to have a cash back option in this cases.
customer_reviews.author: C. H. Villegas

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and design, but a minor problem
customer_reviews.text: This boombox looks awesome. The knobs, display, speakers are all perfect. The sound is nice too, heavy bass and clear sound, i could stare at the elements pumping bass for a long time! Although after a couple of weeks i noticed a sharp noise coming from the speaker when i turned on a heavy sub bass song. Not sure why this happens, i havent downloaded the firmware update yet. All in all a great product though.
customer_reviews.author: pahb

customer_reviews.title: Take your batteries out after use.
customer_reviews.text: An excellent device with great sound, nice features and good looks. But...Take batteries out after use. I spoke with TDK after experiencing the complete draining of my batteries twice (thankfully I use rechargeables). They acknowledged the problem and explained when you turn off the the Sound Cube it is actually going into standby mode and still drawing some power. There is no work around to this issue. Not a handy feature when running on batteries. If planning to bring on an extended trip without easy access to power from the plug. My recommendation is bring something else.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Don't be afraid to buy this vs. a $400 bose if your budget only allows so much. You'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful original design, well crafted, solid rich materials, superb build quality. Sound quality is excellent. A lot more powerful than it looks. Plays like a huge speaker box!!!
customer_reviews.author: LAWFORD GOURGUE

customer_reviews.title: Far better options in the market
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speaker for my living room. When I got it it was already scuffed from shipping, never a good start. I tried it out for a few days to see if it was worth exchanging. The power knob was tight for the first quarter, then loose. The overall quality was poor. It was not compatible with my iPad2, a big issue. The tweeters are pointed to the side so they fail to fill a room with good sound. There is a reason TDK isn't a relevant company anymore. I ultimately returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: AndrewMAD

product_meta.title: TDK Life on Record 77000015410 Sound Cube Audio System
product_meta.description:
Rethink stereo. The TDK Life on Record Sound Cube provides powerful, multi-directional sound in a distinct, compact design that works anywhere, inside or out. Two powerful coaxial drivers deliver space-filling sound in a unique, bold design. An innovative equalizer gives your music a visual heartbeat, while rotary dials give you control over the music source, volume and tone. Digital data streaming allows premium audio decoding and playback while charging Apple iPod and iPhone devices. Inputs include USB, 3.5mm and auxiliary ports that let you connect an iPod, iPhone, smartphone or USB flash drive. You can even plug in your guitar or microphone and mix with other music sources.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Fill any room or space with powerful, multi-directional sound when you play music on the compact and portable TDK Life on Record Sound Cube. Easily controlled with a front-facing screen and retro-style rotary dials, the Sound Cube lets you connect to a variety of music players. You can also plug in your guitar or microphone to become part of the mix.



Dynamic Sound in a Compact Body
With a 360-degree design that enhances the stereo effect, the TDK Sound Cube brings you 20 watts of full-range sound in two powerful 5-1/4-inch coaxial drivers. The system's digital data streaming supplies premium audio decoding for optimal sound output.Based on the retro look of the TDK Life on Record series, the Sound Cube offers a square body, rotary dials, and a classically styled EQ. A padded handle enhances portability so you can easily take your music with you.

Intuitive Controls Offer Ease of Use
The Sound Cube incorporates modern, easy-to-use features. An equalizer gives your music a visual heartbeat. Additionally, two rotary dials let you regulate the volume, toggle through radio stations, and adjust the customizable settings. The front-facing color screen adds a modern touch and makes it easy to navigate the controls.

Play Music from Any Source
Multiple input options--USB, 3.5-millimeter, and auxiliary ports--let you connect a wide variety of music sources, including an iPod, iPhone, smartphone, USB flash drive, and external hard drive. You can also plug in a guitar or microphone to add yourself to the mix. Additionally, a built-in FM radio with five presets lets you program your favorite stations.

For convenience, you can play your music while also charging your iPod or iPhone with the included USB to 30-pin cable.

Product and Warranty Information
Plug in this system with the included AC power supply, or use 12 D batteries (not included) for a portable option.

The TDK Life on Record Sound Cube measures 9-4/5 inches on all sides, and weighs 12-3/5 pounds. It is backed by a one-year manufacturer's limited warranty.

What's in the Box
Sound Cube, AC power supply, USB to 30 pin Apple cable, and 3.5-millimeter audio cable.
